title: Index-Type to Template-Type Refactor Task
details:
TASK: Remove index-type field from YAML and update all code to use template-type instead.

KEY FILES TO UPDATE:
1. MetadataHierarchyDetector.cs - Update UpdateMetadataWithHierarchy method parameter from indexType to templateType
2. VaultIndexProcessor.cs - Replace all index-type references with template-type
3. Test files - Update all test cases to use template-type instead of index-type
4. CLI help text - Update documentation references

CHANGES NEEDED:
- Replace all "index-type" YAML field references with "template-type"
- Update method parameters from indexType to templateType
- Update conditional logic that checks for index-type values
- Update comments and documentation
- Update test cases and fixtures

STATUS: In progress - need to systematically update all code references
